entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
